## Context.ContextTokens class

Helper class to parse and validate context tokens.

</td><td>


</td><td>

Given a value, finds a single token-optional qualifier that matches the value. Fails if no qualifiers match, or if more than one qualifier matches.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

Given a value and a set of qualifiers, finds a single token-optional qualifier that matches the value. Fails if no qualifiers match, or if more than one qualifier matches.
